name: Boss Rush (itch) (Legendary_Pineapple)
description:
Hey there! Boss Rush is a short and sweet 2d combat game, where all you have to do is defeat the boss. I made the game in about a week, and hope to update it more in the future. If you have any feedback at all, please be sure to let me know in the comments,  it's greatly appreciated. Thanks for playing! 

IF AUDIO ISN'T WORKING PLAY FULLSCREEN  

PRESSING QUIT ON THE BROWSER VERSION WILL FREEZE THE GAME

WILL BE FIXED ASAP

Credit to Bitowsky for making the thumbnail

Controls:

Move - Arrow Keys

Attack - Space

Shield - Z

Roll - X

Click here for a devlog on how the game was made!
